messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: D-447 designated for termination. Please stand by until the onsite security retreives you. Do not struggle or you will be shot.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hiya crew i will be your new cap.now i have joined the station half way through the shift so if there are any trsitors or anythin i should know about please message me on my pda. i hope you all have a safe and happy shift.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: For the second time i will not be answering any stuff on the coms. plz message me on my pda if u need help

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
